summary: Completed comprehensive testing of signup flow. Backend APIs are functional (85.7% success rate). Frontend signup form loads correctly and most fields work, but discovered critical UI issues preventing form completion: Date of Birth field cannot be filled and Terms checkbox has overlay interception preventing clicks.

minor_issues.impact: Profile endpoint not available, but doesn't affect signup flow

working_correctly.status: WORKING - Returns 201 status code and creates user successfully
WORKING - Demo login successful with token generation

critical_bugs.issue: Date of Birth input field cannot be filled using standard selectors
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Prevents form completion as DOB is required field
critical_bugs.details: Field with placeholder 'mm/dd/yyyy' is not responding to fill() actions

critical_bugs.issue: Overlay element intercepts pointer events preventing checkbox clicks
critical_bugs.impact: CRITICAL - Prevents form submission as terms acceptance is required
critical_bugs.details: Div element with class 'flex items-start space-x-2 rounded-md border border-white/10 bg-white/5 p-3' blocks checkbox interaction

ui_working_correctly.status: WORKING - Page loads successfully at /signup with proper form layout
WORKING - Name, Email, Password, Mobile, SSN, Address fields all accept input correctly
WORKING - Password strength indicator shows 'Good' and all validation checkmarks work properly
WORKING - All form sections display correctly with proper styling
WORKING - Personal Checking account type is pre-selected and functional

passed_tests: Backend health check responds correctly (200 OK)
User registration API endpoint works (POST /api/auth/register returns 201)
All protected API endpoints (accounts, transactions, KYC) return 200 status
Basic form fields accept input correctly (name, email, password, mobile, SSN, address)
Form layout and styling display correctly

success_percentage.backend: 85.7% - All critical APIs functional, minor profile endpoint issue
success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Form loads and most fields work, but critical completion blockers exist

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL PRIORITY: Fix two blocking issues preventing signup completion: 1) Date of Birth field is not responding to input (check field implementation and selectors), 2) Terms checkbox has overlay interception issue preventing clicks (fix CSS/layout to allow checkbox interaction). These issues prevent users from completing the signup flow despite backend being functional.
